messages.title: Harrington pledges honest campaign
messages.content: Richard Harrington, the local prospective Conservative MP, pledges to fight a clean and honest campaign and to refrain from personal attacks.

issues.health: Richard Harrington supports the Health Campus Project in Watford. His election would ensure David Cameronâ€™s Conservatives invest in Watford Hospital if they win the election.

endorsements.endorsement: Support for Watford Hospital and critique of smear leaflets against Richard Harrington.

quotes.text: It saddens me to meet such publications. They know these scare stories are totally untrue.

images.caption: A letter from Andrew Lansley MP to Claire Ward MP
